item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

Monday 12/10/2012's Location will be:

Happy New Bar!

Michael's Downtown Restaurant

Michael's just opened up approximately a year ago in Downtown New Haven!  Located on Court Street near the corner with Orange (the former location of The Blue Pearl), Michael's offer a cozy atmosphere with various food and drink options.  There is a full bar, pizzas, hot sandwiches, seafood, and fancy Italian dishes.  You may be familiar with Michael's other location"Michael's Trattoria" in Wallingford.

Come on out and share some Holiday Cheer!

The Manager Ryan has generously offered to give us a sampling of Appetizers!

Drink Special will be $1 off Select Beers and Wines on the night (Cab, Chardonay, Pinot)

Please RSVP to give the proprietors an accurate estimate of how many people!

For Happy Hour type events, if you are only a "Maybe" please put this in your RSVP Comment.

AJ will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can try to Call/Text AJ; number below. We're also probably amongst the largest groups at the Bar for a Monday.
